```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tmap)
library(sf)
library(maps)

library(climateR) 
library(terra)
library(AOI)
```

```{r}
my_aoi <- AOI::aoi_get(state = "New York", county = "Schenectady")
```


```{r}
a <- catalog

```


```{r}
raster_nlcd <- vrt_crop_get(
  URL = "/vsicurl/https://storage.googleapis.com/feddata-r/nlcd/2019_Land_Cover_L48.tif",
  catalog = NULL,
  AOI = my_aoi,
  grid = NULL,
  varname = NULL,
  start = NULL,
  end = NULL,
  toptobottom = FALSE,
  verbose = TRUE
)
```

```{r}
r_nlcd <- raster_nlcd$`NLCD Land Cover Class`
```

```{r}
terra::plot(r_nlcd)

```

```{r}
df_r <- terra::as.data.frame(r_nlcd)
```
